DOC.brief_summary: The purpose prospective randomise study investigate electrocardiographic alteration intravascular injection three different test solution bupivacaine epinephrine anaesthetise child 16 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Sensitivity ECG Detection Three Different Intravascular Applied Test Doses Bupivacaine Epinephrine
DOC.criteria: Age 0 16 healthy parental consent ASA > 1 allergy local anaesthetic
